We are rewriting the dictionary feature of our app in Swift. The first update includes the following changes:

• Split-screen view of auto-complete suggestions and dictionary results on iPad
• Other minor UI adjustments

With the next updates we will continue renewing the dictionary search to give you increased functionality.

We are rewriting the dictionary feature of our app in Swift. The first update includes the following changes:

• Split-screen view of auto-complete suggestions and dictionary results on iPad
• Other minor UI adjustments

With the next updates we will continue renewing the dictionary search to give you increased functionality.

Update 8.0.1 fixes a rare crash.

We are rewriting the dictionary feature of our app in Swift. The first update includes the following changes:

• Split-screen view of auto-complete suggestions and dictionary results on iPad
• Other minor UI adjustments

With the next updates we will continue renewing the dictionary search to give you increased functionality.

Versions 8.0.1 and 8.0.2 fixed rare crash issues in the dictionary.

- Two new languages: Polish and Portuguese
- Support for iOS 7
- Support for iPhone 5
- Fixes a crash bug related to search suggestions.

• Faster access to dictionary search from within the results table (iPhone)
• More entries in search history 
• Option to delete individual entries from search history
• Option to hide popular search terms
• Fixed: Screen flickering on some devices caused by faulty refresh of popular search terms
• Other bug fixes

  English ⇄ French
